name: mercury
title: Mercury
description: Quickly see your Mercury accounts and transactions directly in Raycast
author: atkinsmatt101

commands.name: view-transactions
commands.title: View Accounts & Transactions
commands.subtitle: Mercury
commands.description: View accounts and transactions for your Mercury Account

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
